divs: Sighting Detailsstepped outside my side door to stretch as i frequently do. looked up at stars and as i adjusted my eyeglasses to focus on a bright star i notice something moving across my field of vision that only can be explained as perhaps having some cloaking device.i know i saw an outline like at first my mind registered bird but no flaping of wings and continued on straight path until over past my roof. it seamed transparent as if only outline moved although it seamed maybe to have a faint light maybe reflective,like looking at distant stars within the outline. i would have never noticed it if i had not been looking directly at it . i was in my mind trying to make sense of it because it made no noise and had no lights. i once when i lived in breckinridge co. saw with a friend the traditional star size light do the z manuver in the star filled sky and speed off but this sighting is totally different because i have no sense of size or distance or speed it was moving. have there been any other sightings like this?
